Package modes

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    RoverMode
    Interface to use any rover mode indifferently.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    DiagnosticMode
    Implements the diagnostic mode, when the rover is under internal inspection.
    ErrorMode
    Implements the error mode, when the internal inspection of the rover reports any error.
    ExplorationMode
    Implements the exploration mode, when the rover has to explore its environment to locate samples.
    HarvestMode
    Implements the harvest mode, when the rover has located a sample and needs to harvest it.
    LandingMode
    Implements the landing mode, when the rover lands on the surface of Mars.
    SleepMode
    Implements the sleep mode, when the rover needs to sleep after completing its tasks.
    WaitMode
    Implements the wait mode, when the rover needs to wait for a button press.
